programme.title: College Basketball

programme.title: College Basketball

programme.desc: The Hurricanes (5-17, 1-10) try to build on their first ACC win as they visit the Cardinals (17-6, 10-2). Louisville snapped a four-game slide against Miami last season. The Cardinals have won 11 of their last 12, and six in a row on home court.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In Chicago, a saucy spot mashes up Latin and Asian with a unique paella and posole; a comfort food joint in Seattle fires things up with Nashville hot chicken; a place in Kona, Hawaii, mixes island and mainland with guava ribs and tropical pizza.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: In Mesa, Ariz., a Hawaiian joint serves island specialties, including a meaty bun; in Tucson, Ariz., a place cooks up a saucy sandwich and spinach dip calzone; in Miami, Fla., a shop makes artisan doughnuts and turns pastries into savory sandwiches.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Sandwiches and serious spice; in Longmont, a spot with a pork burger and cauliflower; in Columbus, a Chicago-style joint with Italian beef and gyros; Aarti Sequeira and Jet Tila join Guy in LA, where a chef dishes out fiery Thai specialties.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Hearty helpings of comfort include a soul food spot dishing out Southern seafood and killer fried chicken in Atlanta.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri grabs fistfuls of flavor at a California spot bringing next-level Mediterranean to the West Coast; a New Jersey bistro by the beach slings herbaceous octopus, and an Indianapolis Argentine joint fires up chimichurri chorizo.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri finds all kinds of unexpected flavor, starting with next-level sandwiches in Cleveland with Chef Michael Symon; a New Jersey joint is amping up bar bites, and a chef in La Quinta, Calif., reinvents her mom's chilaquiles.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri's grabbing an international playlist of flavor; in Florida, a funky spot is putting a Mediterranean spin on burgers, while a local gem is dishing out Puerto Rican specialties; in Las Vegas, a real deal Mexican joint has bomb birria tacos.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
